hl.seg: Avoiding Dieting to Prevent the Flu.

doc.seg: This research of American scientists was published after many experiments on mice.
Experiments proved that mice on a lower calorie diet had comparatively less ability to fight the flu virus.
Research has proven the old myth of fasting during fever wrong.
According to the scientists, one should eat a lot when one has a fever.

The researchers from the Michigan State University say that the rats on a diet had less power to resist the infection and their chances of dying had increased, whereas rats on a normal diet had better resistance against the flu virus.
According to Professor Elizabeth Gardner, people who diet will not only be affected by the virus flu sooner but, will also have a longer recovery time.
She also said that those people who have taken the flu vaccination should also avoid dieting during the winter months.

hl.seg: First Nuclear Test Done in 1990.

doc.seg: Thomas Reid, who has worked in the Lever National Laboratory in America as a weapon designer, has written this book with the help of the former director of technical intelligence at Los Alamos national laboratory, Dani Stillman.

This book was titled "Nuclear Express: Political History of the Bomb and Its Proliferation," and both writers have claimed that whichever country first made a nuclear bomb either stole the nuclear secrets of another country or had the support of another nuclear power.
in an interview with US news, Thomas Reed said that in 1990, during the rule of Benazir Bhutto, China texted Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Thomas Reid said that, for many reasons, he believes that China had tested Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
The reasons include the design of the bomb and some information gained during talks with the Chinese scientists.
He further added that this was the reason that in 1998 in a span of only two weeks and three days, Pakistan was able to carry out nuclear experiments in response to Indian nuclear experiments.
Thomas Reid reminds us that in 1961 Russia suddenly carried out a nuclear experiment and besides possessing the bomb for a long time, it took 17 days for America to carry out nuclear experiments.
He further said that atomic bomb test Pakistan conducted on May 28, 1998 was made with extreme care, and Pakistani scientists had complete confidence in it.
When Thomas Reid was asked whether China had provided nuclear technology to Pakistan, he said India was the common enemy of both China and Pakistan.
He said that there was proof that Dr. Abdul Qadeer Khan used the Chinese design, and that the documents received from Libya will verify this fact.
Upon further questioning as to whether joint nuclear testing was common, he said that America had openly performed nuclear tests for England in the deserts of Nevada in 1990.
He said that he also assumed that Israel was given access to the results of this test.
Thomas Reid was also asked about China's nuclear distribution program which is ongoing.
In answer, Thomas Reid said that China has been providing raw material, guidance and design for the nuclear setup in Esfahan, Iran since 1991.
Apart from this, China has also provided Iran with an enrichment plant in Kheeraj.
He said that China has been providing nuclear technology to Iran, Syria, Pakistan, Egypt, Libya, and Yemen through North Korea.

doc.seg: Discovered for the first time in October 2008, this virus is known by names like Confecker, Down and Up, and Kido.

Experts say that the number of infected computers could be many.
To get rid of this, dealers need to use Microsoft's MS08-067 patch.
Microsoft says that virus which affects thousands of computers, searches for windows file 'services.exe' and adds itself into its code.
After that, the virus turns into a DLL file in the Windows System folder.
This virus also changes the name of the file.
Then it changes the details of the Windows registry.
This virus creates a problem after it gets active which comes out as 'HTTP Server' and changes the restore point of the machine.
After that, it downloads files from the hacker's website.
Microsoft says that this virus has affected computers in different countries.
These countries include China, Brazil, Russia, India, America and Britain.

there has been a severe shortage of gas in Quetta, Ziarat and other surrounding areas for the past three days. Snow is continuing to fall and temperatures have fallen below the freezing point. Heaters and stoves are out of gas.

hl.seg: Administrator for Jamat-ud-Dawa

doc.seg: The central headquarters of Jamaa'athud Da'wah is in Taibah, about 25 kilometers from Karachi.

Khaqan Babar belongs to the DMG or District Management Group.

Khalid Waheed has disapproved of the appointment of the administrator in the center of Jamaat al Dawa and said that due to the actions of the government, the number of patients in the hospitals and children in the schools of the center have already decreased.

hl.seg: $819 billion economic revival package approved

while defending the delay in the investigation in Pakistan he said that it takes time to collect, understand and check these kind of information.

hl.seg: Financial Crisis: Suicide of Billionaire German Industrialist.

doc.seg: Adolf Merckle, a resident of Sawabia in Southern Germany, left a huge business group behind him.
But earlier common German citizens did not know much about him.
when he had to negotiate with 30 banks who lent money to his industrial group, he became the topic of the headlines and he could foresee the murky future of the Merckle group.
The Merkle group had to face a loss of a few hundred million Euros due to financial crisis after it bought shares in the German car manufacturing company, Volkswagen.
Financial institutions then refused to give it the new 700 million to one billion euro loan it needed on an immediate basis, so Merkle was under intense pressure.

Some time back, the bank agreed to provide Merkel Group an emergency loan. But, Adolf Merkel,who raised a small industrialist group to the position of a strong industrial group whose annual income was approximately 30 billion Euro, could not bare the loss in his investment capability.
After the death of his father, when Adolf Merkel took over his family business, he developed it quickly, putting it on a new track.
He called his company Ratiopharm, which is a very successful and large pharmaceutical company in Germany.

Until a while ago, the value of this business was between 5 and 6 billion Euros, and it still earns about 8.1 billion Euros a year.After the superb success of Ratiopharm,the Merkel group started buying many other institutions which included construction supply manufacturing companies like Hydelburg Cement to car manufacturing companies like Kassbohrer.
The number of employees of the Merkel Group around the world is near 100,000, and its foundation company, the pharmaceutical company Ratiopharm, always had special importance.
Adolf Merkel has said many times in his life: "It has been four generations since I started making medicine.
Now the management of this group is in the hands of my children and I hope that the management of this company will remain in my family for a few hundred years.

After the suicide of Adolf Merkel, banks sanctioned 400 million euros in floating loans for his group, but under the condition that VEM will have to sell Ratiopharm so that it can improve its financial conditions in the long term.
Likewise after the death of Adolf Meerklay, the Meerklay group will not remain as it was.

results showed that the foreigners here have

hl.seg: Provincial elections in Iraq.

This is the second death of an important Hamas figure, in the week-long Israeli attacks on the Gaza belt.
The office bearer of Hamas has said that Abu Zakaria Al Jamal died on Saturday in the Al Shujahia street, located in the east of Gaza City.

hl.seg: Tea: an Effective Cure for Breast Cancer

doc.seg: According to a new research, three cups of tea a day
can decrease the risk of cancer in women below 50 years of age, by more than a third.
Research at the Moffitt Cancer Center in the American State of Florida, has showed that chances of getting chest cancer in those women under 50 years of age
who drink at least three cups of tea a day is reduced by up to 37%.
The research study also claims that it does not help older women even if they drink three or more cups of tea daily.
Specialists think that this is because of the presence of such components in tea that are more effective against the types of cancer tumors which usually target women under 50 years of age.
In Moffitt Cancer Center, in the city of Tampa, Florida state, a research was conducted on over 5000 women, who had undergone treatment for breast cancer.
Their ages were between 20 and 74 years.
Experts compared their medical records and lifestyles with women who were safe from breast cancer.
The experts also found out that on a particular type of cancer, Lobular, tea had shown a great effect and it reduced by 66 percent.
Almost every tenth patient of breast cancer suffers from this type of it.
This type of cancer is more dangerous because it originates deep inside the breast tissue, and is usually diagnosed when it has already spread to a great extent.
Experts say that by drinking at least three cups of tea a day, the danger of breast cancer can be reduced in young women.
They say that incorporating tea as a regular drink in your daily routine helps create immunity against the cancer.
In Britain every year almost 40,000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer.

hl.seg: Why Reduce Exercise With Age?
New research

doc.seg: Exercise at any age is good for health.
It energizes your heart, reduces cholesterol levels, helps in keeping weight low, helps to prevent diabetes and slows down the process of Alzheimer's or dementia.
Unfortunately the ability to exercise reduces in many people with the age.
experts say that exercise keeps our body and brain active, however, age can affect it.
The American Medical Association says that Many health problems can occur if exercise is not carried out.
Dr. Patricia Palecca of Mayo Clinic, Minnesota says that an increase in age is a major cause of inability to excercise and lack of bodily activity.
Dr. Patricia teaches medicine at the Mayo Clinic.
She headed a research trial regarding heart diseases and the ability to participate in exercise in older age.
A team of doctors used high frequency sound waves to observe the performance of heart
The pumping of the blood by the heart, its contraction and relaxation was studied.
The experts focused on the left part of the heart, which is the main part for pumping blood.
They came to know ,that with increase in age, problems increase in the relaxation action of heart.
Dr. Patricia says that as age increases the faults in the relaxation of the heart begin to appear and this affects the ability to exercise.
Dr. Garwin Cain was also a part of this study.
He says that they were surprised to see that it has an effect, as it confirmed that poor exercising ability is closely related to the heart's relaxation phase.
Sometimes blood pressure can cause faults in the working of the heart and can become a cause of heart diseases.
If the doctor and the patient work together on the faults of the heart they can achieve the benefits of exercise, despite the increase in age.
A detailed report of this has been published in the magazine of the American Medical Association.
